name: King Cake Mania
description:
King Cake Mania is acarde game for kids and everyone
- Start your dessert mania now! You will enjoy dashing and splashing a verity of sweets such as chocolate cookies, fruit jelly and shamrock cake.

- King Cake Mania is the most fantastic and lovely cake smash game. Addictive and attractive, you will be crazy about it!
- Colorful cake will be smashed when you match 3 of the same color in a line.
- When match four of the same color cake, the whole line will be eliminated.
- More of the same color cake together, more amazing effects there will be. Come on and use your head to smash them all!
- Complete crushes and collect materials to make delicious cookie cakes!
Free Match 3 game, like Bejeweled and Candy Crush

How to Play :
- Use match 3 combinations to make score.
- match 3 or more identical cake to crush them!
- Reach scores before time out

- Hurry up and begin your match 3 sweet cupcake crush adventure now!
- Thank for play King Cake Mania
